Monologue.Current: “Long time, no see!{Line} I’m a better card player now.”
Monologue.Original: “Long time, no see!{Line} I’m a better card player now.”

Monologue.Current: “Hey, what happened?{Line} Looks like we crashed into{Line} something.”
Monologue.Original: “Hey, what happened?{Line} Looks like we crashed into{Line} something.”

Monologue.Current: “The Garden is becoming so lonely.{Line} So many people dropped out...”
Monologue.Original: “The Garden is becoming so lonely.{Line} So many people dropped out...”

Monologue.Current: “What’s her name... {Char Rinoa}?{Line} I hope she recovers soon.”
Monologue.Original: “What’s her name... {Char Rinoa}?{Line} I hope she recovers soon.”

Monologue.Current: “How’s it going!?{Line} You haven’t been around lately.{Line} Working hard?”
Monologue.Original: “How’s it going!?{Line} You haven’t been around lately.{Line} Working hard?”

Monologue.Current: “Hey, why don’t you play a card game{Line} with me once in a while?”
Monologue.Original: “Hey, why don’t you play a card game{Line} with me once in a while?”

Monologue.Current: “Mornin’. Gee, things were{Line} really out of control around here!{Line} So, what was this{Line} master guy like?”
Monologue.Original: “Mornin’. Gee, things were{Line} really out of control around here!{Line} So, what was this{Line} master guy like?”

Monologue.Current: “Mornin’... Oh, the headmaster?{Line} I saw him somewhere around here.”
Monologue.Original: “Mornin’... Oh, the headmaster?{Line} I saw him somewhere around here.”

Monologue.Current: “Mornin’.{Line} What is it this time?”
Monologue.Original: “Mornin’.{Line} What is it this time?”

Monologue.Current: “Mornin’! I’m seeing stars!{Line} My ears are ringing!{Line} What happened?”
Monologue.Original: “Mornin’! I’m seeing stars!{Line} My ears are ringing!{Line} What happened?”

Monologue.Current: “Mornin’, it’s you!{Line} Why do you always look so serious...!?{Line} Smile! Ha ha ha ha ha......”
Monologue.Original: “Mornin’, it’s you!{Line} Why do you always look so serious...!?{Line} Smile! Ha ha ha ha ha......”

Monologue.Current: “M-M-Mornin’......{Line} Sniff......{Line} I’m really sad......”
Monologue.Original: “M-M-Mornin’......{Line} Sniff......{Line} I’m really sad......”

Monologue.Current: “Mornin’, I’m feeling fine!{Line} You gotta keep goin’,{Line} can’t look back...{Line} Keep moving and I’ll be fine.”
Monologue.Original: “Mornin’, I’m feeling fine!{Line} You gotta keep goin’,{Line} can’t look back...{Line} Keep moving and I’ll be fine.”

Monologue.Current: “Mornin’, mornin’!{Line} Good morning to you!”
Monologue.Original: “Mornin’, mornin’!{Line} Good morning to you!”

Monologue.Current: “Good morning!{Line} It’s a beautiful day outside again.”
Monologue.Original: “Good morning!{Line} It’s a beautiful day outside again.”

Monologue.Current: “Good morning.{Line} What an ordeal we’ve been through...{Line} Do you think the master will{Line} do anything like this again?”
Monologue.Original: “Good morning.{Line} What an ordeal we’ve been through...{Line} Do you think the master will{Line} do anything like this again?”

Monologue.Current: “Good morning!{Line} If you’re looking for the headmaster,{Line} I saw him at the infirmary.”
Monologue.Original: “Good morning!{Line} If you’re looking for the headmaster,{Line} I saw him at the infirmary.”

Monologue.Current: “Good morning.{Line} Are you looking for somebody again?”
Monologue.Original: “Good morning.{Line} Are you looking for somebody again?”

Monologue.Current: “G-G-Good morning.{Line} W-W- What was that loud noise?{Line} Are we ok?”
Monologue.Original: “G-G-Good morning.{Line} W-W- What was that loud noise?{Line} Are we ok?”

Monologue.Current: “Good morning, sir.{Line} You really are something...{Line} You’re just amazing{Line} at everything.”
Monologue.Original: “Good morning, sir.{Line} You really are something...{Line} You’re just amazing{Line} at everything.”

Monologue.Current: “Hey...{Line} Is it really over?”
Monologue.Original: “Hey...{Line} Is it really over?”

Monologue.Current: “Good morning.{Line} I’m never leaving this Garden.{Line} It’s like my second home.”
Monologue.Original: “Good morning.{Line} I’m never leaving this Garden.{Line} It’s like my second home.”

Monologue.Current: “Quad”
Monologue.Original: “Quad”

Monologue.Current: “Infirmary”
Monologue.Original: “Infirmary”

Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“В ночные часы все помещения закрыты,{Line} за исключение тернировочного центра.”{Next}“Вернись в общежитие.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“It’s after-hours. All facilities except{Line} the training center are closed.”{Next}“Return to your dorm.”

Monologue.Original: “Hey, play cards with me?”{Line}Yes{Line}No
